Birthday, Bouquet, Hand-Picked, New Arrivals, Top Offers

Meandering Dreams Flower Bouquet

Add to wishlist
Compare

Meandering Dreams Flower Bouquet is a captivating floral arrangement, perfect for a myriad of special moments. This enchanting bouquet features a harmonious blend of roses, spray roses or eustoma, lilies, and chrysanthemums, creating a truly unique and breathtaking composition sure to convey your sentiments.

229.00 د.إ – 749.00 د.إ

Clear
Add to wishlist
Compare
  • Description
  • Specification

Nestled within a pristine white hat box, the bouquet exudes elegance and sophistication, while also serving as a practical vessel to preserve the flowers’ freshness and beauty over an extended period.

Whether you aim to surprise your significant other on Valentine’s Day, extend birthday wishes to a dear friend, or offer congratulations to a deserving family member, Meandering Dreams emerges as the ideal choice. Its versatility makes it a splendid gift option for an array of occasions, ensuring your gesture resonates with heartfelt sincerity.

SKU: CFF156 Categories: Birthday, Bouquet, Hand-Picked, New Arrivals, Top Offers
Size

Extra Large, Large, Regular, Small

Color

Pink, White
